name: soul-polyglot
description: Multi-paradigm language compiling to CASM bytecode; runs on SoulVM (Node.js or browser).

scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('g++ -std=c++17 -O2 -o soulc src/compiler/main.cpp',{stdio:'inherit'});console.log('Built soulc');}catch(e){console.log('Build failed. Need g++ (MinGW on Windows). Try: make, or build.bat / build.ps1');process.exit(1);}"
